description: Passes Completed

Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch
Passes that travel more than 40 yards of the width of the pitch
Passes made while under pressure from opponent
Completed pass sent between back defenders into open space
Completed passes that enter the 1/3 of the pitch closest to the goal (not including set pieces)
Completed passes into the 18-yard box (not including set pieces)
Completed crosses into the 18-yard box
Passes that directly lead to a shot (assisted shots)
Passes that are within the two offensive actions(passes, dribbles and drawing fouls) that lead directly to a shot
Passes that are within the two offensive actions(passes, dribbles and drawing fouls) that lead directly to a goal
Expected Assists: expected goals which follows a pass that assists a shot
